name: Janken (kaspo_studio)
description: A rock-paper-scissors rhythm game is a game that combines elements of the classic hand game with rhythm gameplay. In this game, players must follow a rhythm and input the correct hand sign at the right time to win and have a high score. The rules of the hand game still apply, with rock beating scissors, scissors beating paper, and paper beating rock. However, the added element of rhythm adds an additional layer of challenge and skill to the game.
